Dear Dr. Goodwin,

I get an error while loading ctml files with gas =
IdealGasMix(rxnmech). "negative or zero A coefficient for reaction xxx"

But when I lock at the xml-file there ist no negative number. Below is
the reaction definition in the various formats.

******************************
chemkin-format:
C2H2+O2<=>C2HO+OH               2.000E+08        1.500   30114.72

cti-file:
reaction( "C2H2 + O2 <=> C2HO + OH",   [2.00000E+08, 1.5, 30114.7]) 

xml-file:
    <reaction reversible="yes" id="0104">
      <equation>C2H2 + O2 [=] C2HO + OH</equation>
      <rateCoeff>
        <Arrhenius>
           <A>2.000000E+05</A>
           <b>1.5</b>
           <E units="cal/mol">30114.700000</E>
        </Arrhenius>
      </rateCoeff>
      <reactants>C2H2:1 O2:1</reactants>
      <products>C2HO:1 OH:1</products> 
************************************************

I tried cantera 1.5.5r3 and 1.5.5.r4 but the error remains. I'm using
cygwin under windows xp with gcc 3.3.3.    

best regards
Ulf
